channel.title: OrthoMCL on SR-C
channel.description: Recent content in OrthoMCL on SR-C

item.title: 自动化运行OrthoMCL
item.description: 安装 1 git clone https://github.com/apetkau/orthomcl-pipeline.git Perl模块 通过cpanm安装 1 cpanm BioPerl DBD::mysql DBI Parallel::ForkManager YAML::Tiny Set::Scalar Text::Table Exception::Class Test::Most Test::Warn Test::Exception Test::Deep Moose SVG Algorithm::Combinatorics 依赖软件 OrthoMCL 或 OrthoMCL Custom （能够自定义序列识别符的修改版本） BLAST (blastall, formatdb) 注意不是
